intro_price2.dialog: |wave|Solara has found a new type of gift!
Now that Solara knows where the |C3|Bonus Gifts|C0| are found, new rules of karma have been revealed to Solara.
The first rule is that |C3|Bonus Gift prices|C0| will increase separately from Power Gift prices.
The other rule is a little more complicated.
You knew that every time Solara gets you a gift, more karma is needed for the next one.
But Solara has discovered that this |C3|increases even faster|C0| for other gifts of the same type.
Taking a gift that makes your |C3|Heart Shots|C0| stronger, will increase the price of |C3|other Heart Shot gifts|C0| even more!
This happens for all categories of Power Gifts!
|wave|More to think about while you shop.

intro_love_power.dialog: Solara has invented a |C3|Love Power Measurement Device|C0| for you!
Solara is well known for inventing |wave|all kinds of devices.
Solara will show you how it works.
This is your current |C3|Love Power|C0| against the endless nightmare.
The device uses Solara's algorithm to calculate how your heart compares to the power of the nightmare.
The most important factor is how much |C3|Love Per Second|C0| you are able to blast at those monsters!
But the nightmare keeps getting stronger after every monster you fight!
So your calculated |C3|Love Power|C0| will always shrink after every battle.
That's why you will always need more gifts to keep up!
But this is the most important part.
Any gift that increases your |C3|Love Power over 100%|C0| will also cost more karma to take!
The higher your |C3|Love Power|C0| goes above 100%, the more expensive all gifts will become!
Luckily, this part of the prices will go back down if you wait until it drops below 100% again.
|wave|Solara is very proud of the |C3|Love Power Measurement Device!

intro_quick.dialog: The prices of Quick Gifts will increase separately from the other gift types.
Quick Gifts will not change your Love Power when you buy them, because they will not be active yet.
So, that means buying Quick Gifts will never change the prices of other gift types!
The |C3|Love Power Measurement Device|C0| will still show you how strong your heart will be when you activate a Quick Gift.

intro_blessings.dialog: |wave|Your happy place is now blessed with blessings!
Blessings increase in price with each Power Gift you buy, but at a much slower rate.
But, the inverse is not true!|L||!|Buying Blessings will not permanently increase the prices of any other gifts.
There is one thing to be careful of.
Blessings can greatly increase your |C3|Love Power|C0| for a few battles.
That means |C3|Love Power|C0| from Blessings can increase the prices of other gifts temporarily!
Just be careful with the order you choose to buy your gifts.

intro_burdens.dialog: |wave|Your happy place is now burdened with burdens!
